id=\"gn__section--admissions-aid\" class=\"gn__section gn__section--admissions-aid\" tabindex=\"0\">\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\n\t\t\t\t\t\t<span class=\"gn__label gn__label--secondary gn__open-morph modal-trigger\" onclick=\"gc.openModal(this, 'modal--admissions-aid', {top: '48px', mobileOnly: true, color: 'rgb(59, 19, 89)'});\">Admissions &amp; Aid</span>\n\n\t\t\t\t\t\t<div Aid</span>\n\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t<input type=\"checkbox\" id=\"gn__input-student-life-student-life\" class=\"gn__input hide\">\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t<div class=\"gn__subsection\">\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t<a href=\"/campuslife/\" class=\"gn__subsection-heading gn__link Campus</span>\n\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t<input class=\"gn__subsection\">\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t<a href=\"/news/\" class=\"gn__subsection-heading gn__link gn__link--heading 6-3v3l6-4-6-4v3c-4 0-6 2.495-6 5zM11 12h-9v-6h1.967c0.158-0.186 0.327-0.365 0.508-0.534 0.687-0.644 1.509-1.135 2.439-1.466h-6.914v10h13v-4.197l-2 1.333v0.864z\"></path></svg>\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t</a>\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t<label for=\"gn__input-news-events-news-events\" class=\"gn__subsection-heading hide-on-desktop\">\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tNews &amp; Events\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t</label>\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t<ul class=\"gn__subsection-list\" style=\"min-width: 13em\">\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t<li class=\"hide-on-desktop\"><a href=\"/news/\" class=\"gn__link gn__link--heading\" tabindex=\"0\">News &amp; Events</a></li>\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t<li><a href=\"/calendar/\" class=\"gn__link\" tabindex=\"0\">Events entry--padded\">\n\t\t\t<h2 class=\"modal__title\">Request Information</h2>\n\t\t\t<p>Get essential information about our academic programs, admissions &amp; financial aid. Your admissions counselor will also follow up with specific questions.</p>\n\t\t\t<p>\n\t\t\t\t<a class=\"button button--gray\" data-click-event=\"Top Nav CTA: undergrad - info\" href=\"/admissions/contact/?gc_source=topnavcta\">Undergraduate</a>\n\t\t\t\t<a class=\"button button--gray\" data-click-event=\"Top Nav CTA: adult - info\" href=\"/adult/?gc_source=topnavcta#request-information\">Adult &amp; Continuing Studies</a>\n\t\t\t\t<a class=\"button button--gray\" data-click-event=\"Top Nav CTA: graduate - info\" href=\"/graduate/?gc_source=topnavcta#request-information\">Graduate</a>\n\t\t\t</p>\n\t\t\t<p>If you're not a prospective student or parent, feel free to email general questions to <a style=\"color:#BDBDBD; background: none;\" href=\"mailto:info@goshen.edu\">info@goshen.edu</a></p>\n\t\t</div>\n\t</div>\n</div>\n\n<div id=\"modal--visit\" class=\"modal modal--cta\">\n\t<div class=\"modal__box\">\n\t\t<button class=\"modal__close modal__close--right\" aria-label=\"Close\"><span class=\"icon icon--close\"></span></button>\n\t\t<div class=\"modal__content entry entry--padded\">\n\t\t\t<h2 class=\"modal__title\">Visit Campus</h2>\n\t\t\t<p>Visiting our campus is one of the best ways to get a feel for Goshen — from classes and dorms to the dining hall menu — and decide if it’s a good fit for you. We are a friendly community where people are happy to answer your questions and show you around.</p>\n\t\t\t<p>\n\t\t\t\t<a class=\"button button--gray\" data-click-event=\"Top Nav CTA: undergrad - visit\" href=\"/admissions/visit/?gc_source=topnavcta\">Undergraduate</a>\n\t\t\t\t<a class=\"button button--gray\" data-click-event=\"Top Nav CTA: adult - visit\" href=\"/adult/visit/?gc_source=topnavcta\">Adult &amp; Continuing Studies</a>\n\t\t\t\t<a class=\"button button--gray\" data-click-event=\"Top Nav CTA: graduate - visit\" href=\"/graduate/visit/?gc_source=topnavcta\">Graduate</a>\n\t\t\t</p>\n\t\t</div>\n\t</div>\n</div>\n\n<div id=\"modal--apply\" class=\"modal modal--cta\">\n\t<div class=\"modal__box\">\n\t\t<button class=\"modal__close modal__close--right\" aria-label=\"Close\"><span class=\"icon icon--close\"></span></button>\n\t\t<div class=\"modal__content entry entry--padded\">\n\t\t\t<h2 class=\"modal__title\">Apply Now</h2>\n\t\t\t<p>Take the next step!</p>\n\t\t\t<p>\n\t\t\t\t<a class=\"button button--gray\" data-click-event=\"Top Nav CTA: undergrad - apply\" href=\"/admissions/apply/?gc_source=topnavcta\">Undergraduate</a>\n\t\t\t\t<a class=\"button button--gray\" data-click-event=\"Top Nav CTA: adult - apply\" href=\"/graduate/apply/?gc_source=topnavcta\">Graduate</a>\n\t\t\t</p>\n\t\t</div>\n\t</div>\n</div>\n\t<script async=\"\" src=\"/wp-content/themes/timber-gc/js/dist/header.min.js?cache=1492634433\"></script>\n\n\t\t</header>\n\n\t\t\n\t\t\t<section id=\"\" class=\"lp-section lp-section--standard lp-section--lightgray\">\n\n\t\n\t\t\t\n<style>\n/* Don't display video banner on mobile, just a square image-blur */\n.video-banner {\n\tposition: relative;\n\theight: 0;\n\tpadding-bottom: 100%;\n\toverflow: hidden;\n}\n/* 1x1 aspect ratio image */\n.video-banner .image-blur__image-wrap {\n\tpadding-bottom: 100%;\n}\n/* hide video */\n.video-banner__wrap {\n\tdisplay: none;\n}\n\n@media (min-width: 800px) {\n\n\t.video-banner {\n\t\t/* 2.3x1 aspect ratio */\n\t\tpadding-bottom: 42.5%;\n\t}\n\n\t.video-banner__wrap {\n\t\tdisplay: block;\n\t\tposition: relative;\n\t\tmargin-top: -100%; /* compensate for 2x1 image-blur pushing it down */\n\t\theight: 0;\n\t\tpadding-bottom: 42.5%; /* Tweak to fit narrow video (2.3x1) */\n\t\toverflow: hidden;\n\n\t\t/* initially invisible. fades in once video has buffered a bit */\n\t\topacity: 0;\n\t\ttransition: opacity 1s;\n\t}\n\t.video-banner__wrap--fadein {\n\t\topacity: 1;\n\t\ttransition: opacity 1s;\n\t}\n\t.video-banner__video {\n\t\tposition: absolute;\n\t\ttop: 0;\n\t\tleft: 0;\n\t\twidth: 100% !important;\n\t\theight: 100% !important;\n\t}\n\t.video-banner__button {\n\t\tposition: absolute;\n\t\tbottom: 15%;\n\t\tbottom: calc(10% + 2em);\n    \tright: 2em;\n    \tright: calc(1.5% + 1em);\n\t\tcolor: white;\n\t\twidth: 3em;\n\t\theight: 3em;\n\t\tpadding: .5em;\n\t\tbackground-color: rgba(0,0,0,.25);\n\t\tborder-radius: 50%;\n\t\ttransition: none;\n\t}\n\t.icon--video-banner {\n\t\tdisplay: none;\n\t}\n\t.video-banner__button--playing .icon--pause {\n\t\tdisplay: block;\n\t}\n\t.video-banner__button--paused .icon--play {\n\t\tmargin: -2px -6px 0 0;\n\t\tdisplay: block;\n\t}\n\t.video-banner__button--loading .icon--loading {\n\t\tdisplay: block;\n\t\tanimation: rotate 1s infinite linear;\n\t}\n\t.video-banner__button--play {\n\t\tpadding: 0;\n\t}\n}\n\n@keyframes rotate {\n  from {\n    transform: rotate(0deg);\n  }\n  to {\n    transform: rotate(360deg);\n  }\n}\n\n@media (min-width: 2000px) {\n\t.video-banner {\n\t\tpadding-bottom: 800px;\n\t}\n}\n\n/* transition video banner into next section with a cool curve */\n.video-banner__curve {\n\tposition: absolute;\n\tbottom: 0;\n\theight: 2em;\n}\n@media (min-width: 500px) {\n\t.video-banner__curve {\n\t\theight: 4em;\n\t}\n}\n\n</style>\n\n<div class=\"video-banner\">\n\n\t\n\n<style>\n\n\t@media (min-width: 0px) {\n\t\t#image-blur--1930706171 .image-blur__image-wrap {\n\t\t\tbackground-image: url( https://www.goshen.edu/wp-content/uploads/2017/03/homescreen_test-2-1024x1024.jpg );\n\t\t}\n\t}\n\t@media (min-width: 0px) and (max-width: 400px) {\n\t\t#image-blur--1930706171 .image-blur__image-wrap {\n\t\t\tbackground-image: url( https://www.goshen.edu/wp-content/uploads/2017/03/homescreen_test-2-400x400.jpg );\n\t\t}\n\t}\n\n\n\t@media (min-width: 800px) {\n\t\t#image-blur--1930706171 .image-blur__image-wrap {\n\t\t\tbackground-image: url( https://www.goshen.edu/wp-content/uploads/2017/03/homescreen_test-2-1920x960-1490912221.jpg );\n\t\t}\n\t}\n\t@media (min-width: 800px) and (max-width: 1366px) {\n\t\t#image-blur--1930706171 .image-blur__image-wrap {\n\t\t\tbackground-image: url( https://www.goshen.edu/wp-content/uploads/2017/03/homescreen_test-2-1366x683-1490912221.jpg );\n\t\t}\n\t}\n\t@media (min-width: 800px) and (max-width: 900px) {\n\t\t#image-blur--1930706171 .image-blur__image-wrap {\n\t\t\tbackground-image: url( https://www.goshen.edu/wp-content/uploads/2017/03/homescreen_test-2-900x450-1490912221.jpg );\n\t\t}\n\t}\n\t@media (min-width: 800px) and (max-width: 600px) {\n\t\t#image-blur--1930706171 .image-blur__image-wrap {\n\t\t\tbackground-image: url( https://www.goshen.edu/wp-content/uploads/2017/03/homescreen_test-2-600x300-1490912222.jpg );\n\t\t}\n\t}\n\n</style>\n\n<figure id=\"image-blur--1930706171\" class=\"image-blur \">\n\t<div id=\"image-blur__image-wrap\" class=\"image-blur__image-wrap\">\n\t\t<canvas id=\"image-blur__canvas\" class=\"image-blur__canvas\" width=\"40\" height=\"40\" style=\"width: 40px; height: 40px; opacity: 0;\"></canvas>\n\t</div>\n\t</figure>\n\n\t<script>gc.imageBlur=function(e,t){\"use strict\";function a(){var e=getComputedStyle(c,null).getPropertyValue(\"background-image\").match(/url\\(([^)]+)\\)/i);return e?e[1].replace(/['\"]/g,\"\"):(console.error(\"No background image found for image blur at current screen width\",c),\"\")}/*! Superfast Blur (v. 0.5)\n\t\thttp://www.quasimondo.com/BoxBlurForCanvas\n\t\tCopyright (c) 2011 Mario Klingemann. MIT @license: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/MIT_License. */\nfunction r(e,t,a){var r=e.naturalWidth,o=e.naturalHeight;t.style.width=r+\"px\",t.style.height=o+\"px\",t.width=r,t.height=o;var i=t.getContext(\"2d\");i.clearRect(0,0,r,o),i.drawImage(e,0,0),isNaN(a)||a<1||n(i,0,0,r,o,a)}function n(e,t,a,r,n,o){var i=[1,57,41,21,203,34,97,73,227,91,149,62,105,45,39,137,241,107,3,173,39,71,65,238,219,101,187,87,81,151,141,133,249,117,221,209,197,187,177,169,5,153,73,139,133,127,243,233,223,107,103,99,191,23,177,171,165,159,77,149,9,139,135,131,253,245,119,231,224,109,211,103,25,195,189,23,45,175,171,83,81,79,155,151,147,9,141,137,67,131,129,251,123,30,235,115,113,221,217,53,13,51,50,49,193,189,185,91,179,175,43,169,83,163,5,79,155,19,75,147,145,143,35,69,17,67,33,65,255,251,247,243,239,59,29,229,113,111,219,27,213,105,207,51,201,199,49,193,191,47,93,183,181,179,11,87,43,85,167,165,163,161,159,157,155,77,19,75,37,73,145,143,141,35,138,137,135,67,33,131,129,255,63,250,247,61,121,239,237,117,29,229,227,225,111,55,109,216,213,211,209,207,205,203,201,199,197,195,193,48,190,47,93,185,183,181,179,178,176,175,173,171,85,21,167,165,41,163,161,5,79,157,78,154,153,19,75,149,74,147,73,144,143,71,141,140,139,137,17,135,134,133,66,131,65,129,1],c=[0,9,10,10,14,12,14,14,16,15,16,15,16,15,15,17,18,17,12,18,16,17,17,19,19,18,19,18,18,19,19,19,20,19,20,20,20,20,20,20,15,20,19,20,20,20,21,21,21,20,20,20,21,18,21,21,21,21,20,21,17,21,21,21,22,22,21,22,22,21,22,21,19,22,22,19,20,22,22,21,21,21,22,22,22,18,22,22,21,22,22,23,22,20,23,22,22,23,23,21,19,21,21,21,23,23,23,22,23,23,21,23,22,23,18,22,23,20,22,23,23,23,21,22,20,22,21,22,24,24,24,24,24,22,21,24,23,23,24,21,24,23,24,22,24,24,22,24,24,22,23,24,24,24,20,23,22,23,24,24,24,24,24,24,24,23,21,23,22,23,24,24,24,22,24,24,24,23,22,24,24,25,23,25,25,23,24,25,25,24,22,25,25,25,24,23,24,25,25,25,25,25,25,25,25,25,25,25,25,23,25,23,24,25,25,25,25,25,25,25,25,25,24,22,25,25,23,25,25,20,24,25,24,25,25,22,24,25,24,25,24,25,25,24,25,25,25,25,22,25,25,25,24,25,24,25,18];if(!(isNaN(o)||o<1)){o|=0;var u,g=1;try{u=e.getImageData(t,a,r,n)}catch(l){throw new Error(\"Unable to access image data: \"+l)}for(var m,f,s,d,h,y,w,p,v,b,I,N,q=u.data,_=r-1,x=n-1,S=o+1,k=[],A=[],B=[],C=i[o],D=c[o],E=[],F=[];g-- >0;){for(N=I=0,h=0;h<n;h++){for(m=q[N]*S,f=q[N+1]*S,s=q[N+2]*S,y=1;y<=o;y++)w=N+((y>_?_:y)<<2),m+=q[w++],f+=q[w++],s+=q[w++];for(d=0;d<r;d++)k[I]=m,A[I]=f,B[I]=s,0==h&&(E[d]=((w=d+S)<_?w:_)<<2,F[d]=(w=d-o)>0?w<<2:0),p=N+E[d],v=N+F[d],m+=q[p++]-q[v++],f+=q[p++]-q[v++],s+=q[p++]-q[v++],I++;N+=r<<2}for(d=0;d<r;d++){for(b=d,m=k[b]*S,f=A[b]*S,s=B[b]*S,y=1;y<=o;y++)b+=y>x?0:r,m+=k[b],f+=A[b],s+=B[b];for(I=d<<2,h=0;h<n;h++)q[I]=m*C>>>D,q[I+1]=f*C>>>D,q[I+2]=s*C>>>D,0==d&&(E[h]=((w=h+S)<x?w:x)*r,F[h]=(w=h-o)>0?w*r:0),p=d+E[h],v=d+F[h],m+=k[p]-k[v],f+=A[p]-A[v],s+=B[p]-B[v],I+=r<<2}}e.putImageData(u,t,a)}}var o,i=document.getElementById(e),c=i.querySelector(\".image-blur__image-wrap\"),u=i.querySelector(\".image-blur__canvas\"),g=new Image,l=!1,m=new Image;g.onload=function(){l=!0,requestAnimationFrame(function(){u.style.opacity=0})},g.src=a();for(var f=0;f<t.length/2;f+=2)gc.width>=t[f]&&(o=t[f+1]);o?(m.src=o,requestAnimationFrame(function(){l||r(m,u,2)})):u.style.display=\"none\"};\n//# sourceMappingURL=../sourcemaps/image-blur.min.js.map\n</script>\n\n<script>\n!function()\n{\n\tvar tinyImages = [\n\t\n\t\t0, 'data:image/jpg;base64,',\n\n\t\t\n\t\t800, 'data:image/jpg;base64,',\n\n\t\t];\n\n\tgc.imageBlur('image-blur--1930706171', tinyImages);\n}();\n</script>\n\n\t\t\t<div class=\"video-banner__wrap\">\n\t\t\t\t\t\t<video fill=\"#f5f5f5\"></path>\n</svg>\n</div>\n\n<script>\n!function()\n{\n\tvar video = document.getElementById('video-banner__video--3224393802'),\n\t\tvideoWrap = video.parentNode,\n\t\tvideoButton = document.getElementById('video-banner__button--3224393802'),\n\t\t// Store play/paused state in LocalStorage so that returning users can avoid\n\t\t// video autoplay if desired. Paused state is stored by page using\n\t\tcacheName = 'video-banner-autoplay-3224393802',\n\t\tautoplay = lscache.get(cacheName),\n\t\tstate = 'paused', // 'playing', 'paused', or 'loading'\n\t\tbuffered = false,\n\t\tvisible = false;\n\n\t// Only play on large screens\n\tif ( gc.width < 800 ) return;\n\n\t// Show play/pause/loading button\n\tvideoButton.classList.remove('hide');\n\n\t// If video was played on last page visit -or- this is the first time the user is\n\t// on page and they don't desire reduced motion, play video\n\tif \t( autoplay === true ||\n\t\t( autoplay === null && ! window.matchMedia('(prefers-reduced-motion)').matches ) )\n\t{\n\t\tloadAndPlay();\n\t}\n\n\t// Play video\n\tfunction loadAndPlay()\n\t{\n\t\tif ( !buffered ) {\n\t\t\tupdateState('loading');\n\t\t\tvideo.addEventListener('canplaythrough', function()\n\t\t\t{\n\t\t\t\tbuffered = true;\n\n\t\t\t\t// Wait an additional second (to reduce jar) and then play\n\t\t\t\tsetTimeout(function()\n\t\t\t\t{\n\t\t\t\t\tif ( state === 'loading' ) play();\n\n\t\t\t\t}, 1000);\n\t\t\t});\n\t\t\tvideo.load();\n\t\t}\n\t\telse {\n\t\t\tplay();\n\t\t}\n\t}\n\n\t// Play video, fading it in first if needed\n\tfunction play()\n\t{\n\t\tif ( !visible ) {\n\t\t\tvisible = true;\n\t\t\trequestAnimationFrame(function()\n\t\t\t{\n\t\t\t\tvideoWrap.classList.add('video-banner__wrap--fadein');\n\t\t\t});\n\t\t}\n\n\t\tvideo.play();\n\t\tupdateState('playing');\n\t}\n\n\t// Pause Video\n\tfunction pause()\n\t{\n\t\tvideo.pause();\n\t\tupdateState('paused');\n\t}\n\n\tfunction updateState(newState)\n\t{\n\t\tstate = newState;\n\t\tvideoButton.className = 'video-banner__button video-banner__button--' + state;\n\t}\n\n\tvideoButton.addEventListener('click', function()\n\t{\n\t\tvar autoplay = state === 'paused';\n\n\t\tif ( autoplay ) {\n\t\t\tloadAndPlay();\n\t\t}\n\t\telse {\n\t\t\tpause();\n\t\t}\n\n\t\t// Store last user action in LocalStorage to determine whether to autoplay\n\t\t// video next time this page is loaded\n\t\tlscache.set(cacheName, autoplay, 60 * 24 * 30);\n\t});\n\n}();\n</script>\n\n<!-- Start Shortcoder content --><style type=\"text/css\">\n\t/* Search box */\n\t#homepage-search fill=\"#2d0e44\"></path>\n\t<path d=\"M50 100 L100 40 L100 0 Z\" fill=\"#eee\"></path>\n</svg>\n\n\t\t\t<section id=\"news-events\" class=\"lp-section lp-section--standard lp-section--white\">\n\n\t\t\t<h2 class=\"h1 lp-section__title\">News &amp; Events</h2>\n\t\n\t\t\t<div class=\"entry entry--padded entry--wide photoswipe-gallery\" style=\"padding-top: 0; padding-bottom: 0\">\n\t<link rel=\"stylesheet\" href=\"/wp-content/themes/timber-gc/styles/dist/news.css?cache=1492022741\">\n<div class=\"news-events\">\n\t\t\t<article class=\"card card--news card--column-1\">\n\t\t<a class=\"card__link-wrap\" href=\"https://www.goshen.edu/news/2017/04/19/goshen-college-named-indiana-television-school-year/\" title=\"Goshen College named Indiana Television School of the Year\">\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t<img class=\"card__image card__image--above\" src=\"https://www.goshen.edu/wp-content/uploads/sites/4/2017/04/17_IASB_TV_Award01_bys-400x247.jpg\" width=\"400\" height=\"247\" alt=\"\">\n\t\t\t\t<div class=\"entry entry--padded entry--white\">\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t<img class=\"card__image card__image--inside\" src=\"https://www.goshen.edu/wp-content/uploads/sites/4/2017/04/17_IASB_TV_Award01_bys-400x247.jpg\" width=\"400\" height=\"247\" alt=\"\">\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t<h2 class=\"card__title\"><span>Goshen College named Indiana Television School of the Year</span></h2>\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t<div class=\"entry__meta card__meta\">\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t<time class=\"entry__date\" datetime=\"2017-04-19 10:41:54\">April 19, 2017</time>\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\n\n\t<span class=\"read-count read-count--news-23372 read-count--visible read-count--setup\">Read <strong class=\"read-count__number\">257</strong> times</span>\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t</div>\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t<p class=\"card__excerpt\">Goshen College was crowned Indiana Television School of the Year in the 2017 Indiana Association of School Broadcasters’ (IASB) college competition. This is the fifth time in the last eight years the college has earned that title.</p>\n\t\t\t\t\t</div>\n\t</a>\n\t\t</article>\n\t\t\t<article class=\"card card--news card--column-2\">\n\t\t<a class=\"card__link-wrap\" href=\"https://www.goshen.edu/news/2017/04/11/record-takes-second-indiana-newspaper-year-competition/\" title=\"The Record takes second in Indiana ‘Newspaper of the Year’ competition\">\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t<img class=\"card__image card__image--above\" src=\"https://www.goshen.edu/wp-content/uploads/sites/4/2017/04/2017ICPA-400x247.png\" width=\"400\" height=\"247\" alt=\"Record staff with their awards at the ICPA conference in Indianapolis on April 8.\">\n\t\t\t\t<div class=\"entry entry--padded entry--white\">\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t<img class=\"card__image card__image--inside\" src=\"https://www.goshen.edu/wp-content/uploads/sites/4/2017/04/2017ICPA-400x247.png\" width=\"400\" height=\"247\" alt=\"Record staff with their awards at the ICPA conference in Indianapolis on April 8.\">\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t<h2 class=\"card__title\"><span>The Record takes second in Indiana ‘Newspaper of the Year’ competition</span></h2>\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t<div class=\"entry__meta card__meta\">\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t<time class=\"entry__date\" datetime=\"2017-04-11 10:07:56\">April 11, 2017</time>\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\n\n\t<span class=\"read-count read-count--news-23313 read-count--visible read-count--setup\">Read <strong class=\"read-count__number\">170</strong> times</span>\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t</div>\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t<p class=\"card__excerpt\">Twenty-one Goshen College students received awards and The Record finished second in the “Newspaper of the Year” competition among Indiana colleges at the Indiana Collegiate Press Association’s annual convention in Indianapolis on April 8.</p>\n\t\t\t\t\t</div>\n\t</a>\n\t\t</article>\n\t\n\t<article class=\"card card--news card--event card--column-3\">\n\t\t<a class=\"card__link-wrap\" href=\"https://www.goshen.edu/graduation/\" title=\"Goshen College’s 119th Commencement\">\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t<img class=\"card__image card__image--above\" src=\"https://www.goshen.edu/wp-content/uploads/sites/4/2014/04/10Commencement_bys_3-400x247-1420227313.jpg\" width=\"400\" height=\"247\" alt=\"\">\n\t\t\t\t<div class=\"entry entry--padded entry--white\">\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t<img class=\"card__image card__image--inside\" src=\"https://www.goshen.edu/wp-content/uploads/sites/4/2014/04/10Commencement_bys_3-400x247-1420227313.jpg\" width=\"400\" height=\"247\" alt=\"\">\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t<div class=\"entry__event-dates\">\n\t\t<span class=\"entry__event-dates-bg\">\n\t\t\t<svg class=\"icon icon--calendar\" viewBox=\"0 0 32 32\" height=\"1em\" width=\"1em\">\n\t\t\t\t<title>calendar</title>\n\t\t\t\t<path d=\"M10 12h4v4h-4zM16 12h4v4h-4zM22 12h4v4h-4zM4 24h4v4h-4zM10 24h4v4h-4zM16 24h4v4h-4zM10 18h4v4h-4zM16 18h4v4h-4zM22 18h4v4h-4zM4 18h4v4h-4zM26 0v2h-4v-2h-14v2h-4v-2h-4v32h30v-32h-4zM28 30h-26v-22h26v22z\"></path>\n\t\t\t</svg>\n\t\t\tSunday, April 30\n\t\t</span>\n\t</div>\n\t\t\t\t\t\t<h2 class=\"card__title\"><span>Goshen College’s 119th Commencement</span></h2>\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t</div>\n\t</a>\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t<article class=\"card card--news card--events-list\">\n\t<a class=\"card__link-wrap\" href=\"https://gcmusiccenter.org/event/che-malambo/\" title=\"Performing Arts Series: Che Melambo\">\n\t\t<div class=\"entry__event-dates\">\n\t\t\t<span class=\"entry__event-dates-bg\">\n\t\t\t\t<svg class=\"icon icon--calendar\" viewBox=\"0 0 32 32\" height=\"1em\" width=\"1em\">\n\t\t\t\t\t<title>calendar</title>\n\t\t\t\t\t<path d=\"M10 12h4v4h-4zM16 12h4v4h-4zM22 12h4v4h-4zM4 24h4v4h-4zM10 24h4v4h-4zM16 24h4v4h-4zM10 18h4v4h-4zM16 18h4v4h-4zM22 18h4v4h-4zM4 18h4v4h-4zM26 0v2h-4v-2h-14v2h-4v-2h-4v32h30v-32h-4zM28 30h-26v-22h26v22z\"></path>\n\t\t\t\t</svg>\n\t\t\t\tTuesday, May 2\n\t\t\t</span>\n\t\t</div>\n\n\t\t<h2 class=\"card__title\"><span>Performing Arts Series: Che Melambo</span></h2>\n\t</a>\n</article>\n\t\t\t</article>\n</div>\n\n<p style=\"text-align: center; clear: both;\"><a class=\"button button--strong\" href=\"/news/\">Latest news</a> <a class=\"button\" href=\"/news/events/\">Upcoming events</a></p>\n\n</div>\n\t</section>\n\n\t\t\t\n<section class=\"lp-section lp-section--parallax lp-section--what-s-the-goshen-difference lp-section--lightgray\">\n\n\t<svg class=\"lp-separator\" width=\"100%\" viewBox=\"0 0 100 100\" preserveAspectRatio=\"none\">\n\t\t\t<path d=\"M0 100 C 20 0 50 0 100 100 L 100 -1 0 -1 Z\" fill=\"#fff\"></path>\n\t</svg>\n\n\t\t<div id=\"what-s-the-goshen-difference\" class=\"parallax-caption lp-separator-before\">\n\t\t\t\t\t<h2 class=\"h1 lp-section__title\">What’s the Goshen Difference?</h2>\n\t\t\t\t<div class=\"parallax-caption__content entry entry--padded\">\n\t\t\t<p><img class=\"size-full wp-image-5641 squirrel-on-globe alignright\" src=\"https://www.goshen.edu/wp-content/uploads/2017/03/globe.png\" alt=\"Squirrel sitting on globe\" width=\"227\" height=\"300\"></p>\n<h3>Study Abroad</h3>\n<p>Experience one of the best study abroad programs in the country, combining study, service and complete cultural immersion!</p>\n<p><a class=\"button\" href=\"/sst/\">Current Destinations</a></p>\n<p><img class=\"alignleft size-full wp-image-5654\" src=\"https://www.goshen.edu/wp-content/uploads/2017/03/faith.png\" alt=\"One squirrel serves another squirrel tea\" width=\"300\" height=\"299\" srcset=\"https://www.goshen.edu/wp-content/uploads/2017/03/faith.png 300w, https://www.goshen.edu/wp-content/uploads/2017/03/faith-150x150.png 150w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 300px) 100vw, 300px\"></p>\n<h3>Active Faith</h3>\n<p>Living out their faith and values takes many forms for Goshen students and alumni: rebuilding homes after natural disasters, addressing injustices, and reducing international conflicts.</p>\n<p><a class=\"button\" href=\"/faith/\">Faith at Goshen College</a></p>\n<p><img class=\"alignright size-full wp-image-5645\" src=\"https://www.goshen.edu/wp-content/uploads/2017/03/enviro.png\" alt=\"Squirrel in the marsh with a bird on its head\" width=\"320\" height=\"233\"></p>\n<h3 style=\"clear: left;\">Commitment to Sustainability</h3>\n<p>Goshen has been named one of America’s Greenest Colleges for many reasons. You’ll discover why in your classes, in the dining hall, across campus and at our 1,189-acre environmental center.</p>\n<p><a class=\"button\" href=\"/sustainability/\">Current Initiatives</a></p>\n<p>&nbsp;</p>\n\n\t\t</div>\n\t</div>\n\n\t<svg class=\"lp-separator\" width=\"100%\" viewBox=\"0 0 100 100\" preserveAspectRatio=\"none\">\n\t\t\t<path d=\"M0 0 C 50 100 80 100 100 0 L 100 101 0 101 Z\" fill=\"#212121\"></path>\n\t</svg>\n\n</section>\n\n\t<style>\n\t\t.lp-section--what-s-the-goshen-difference {\n\t\t\tbackground-image: url(https://www.goshen.edu/wp-content/uploads/2014/07/gc.fall_.2013.726-400x400.jpg);\n\t\t}\n\t\t@media (min-width: 400px) {\n\t\t\t.lp-section--what-s-the-goshen-difference {\n\t\t\t\tbackground-image: url(https://www.goshen.edu/wp-content/uploads/2014/07/gc.fall_.2013.726-600x300.jpg);\n\t\t\t}\n\t\t}\n\t\t@media (min-width: 600px) {\n\t\t\t.lp-section--what-s-the-goshen-difference {\n\t\t\t\tbackground-image: url(https://www.goshen.edu/wp-content/uploads/2014/07/gc.fall_.2013.726-900x450.jpg);\n\t\t\t}\n\t\t}\n\t\t/* from this point on, image are stretched (background-position: cover, background-position: fixed) */\n\t\t@media (min-width: 900px), (min-width: 900px) and (min-height: 450px) {\n\t\t\t.lp-section--what-s-the-goshen-difference {\n\t\t\t\tbackground-image: url(https://www.goshen.edu/wp-content/uploads/2014/07/gc.fall_.2013.726-1366x683.jpg);\n\t\t\t}\n\t\t}\n\t\t@media (min-width: 1366px), (min-width: 900px) and (min-height: 768px) {\n\t\t\t.lp-section--what-s-the-goshen-difference {\n\t\t\t\tbackground-image: url(https://www.goshen.edu/wp-content/uploads/2014/07/gc.fall_.2013.726-1920x960.jpg);\n\t\t\t}\n\t\t}\n\t</style>\n\t\t\t<section id=\"goshen-college-on-instagram\" class=\"lp-section lp-section--standard lp-section--darkgray\">\n\n\t\t\t<h2 class=\"h1 lp-section__title\">Goshen College on Instagram</h2>\n\t\n\t\t\t<style>\n/* core gallery styles */\n.gallery {\n\tmargin: 1em 0 0 -.5em;\n\toverflow: hidden;\n}\n.gallery .wf-column {\n\tpadding-left: .5em;\n}\n.gallery__item {\n\tmargin: 0 !important;\n\topacity: 1;\n\ttransition: opacity .3s;\n}\n.gallery__image {\n\tmargin: 0 0 .5em 0 !important;\n}\n\n/* center images when in a single column */\n.gallery--instagram {\n\ttext-align: center;\n\tmax-width: 1760px;\n\tmargin: 0 auto;\n}\n/* instagram linked caption */\n.gallery--instagram figcaption {\n\tdisplay: none;\n}\n\n/* loading message */\n.gallery--loading {\n\theight: 10em;\n}\n.gallery--loading:before {\n\tcontent: \"Loading Instagram feed...\";\n\tdisplay: block;\n\tmargin: 1em 0 0 0;\n\tpadding: 2em;\n\tbackground-color: #f5f5f5;\n}\n.lp-section--darkgray .gallery--loading:before {\n\tcolor: #F5F5F5;\n\tbackground-color: #424242;\n}\n.gallery--loading .gallery__item {\n\topacity: 0;\n}\n\n/* only display up to 3 rows of images on phone/tablet */\n.gallery--instagram .gallery__item:nth-child(n+4) {\n\tdisplay: none;\n}\n/* only display 2 rows on desktop */\n@media (min-width: 1207px) {\n\t.gallery--instagram .gallery__item:nth-child(n+3) {\n\t\tdisplay: none;\n\t}\n}\n</style>\n\n<div class=\"photoswipe-gallery\">\n\t<section id=\"gallery--1308488258\" class=\"gallery gallery--instagram gallery--loading\">\n\t\t\t</section>\n</div>\n\n<script>\n!function ()\n{\n\t'use strict';\n\n\tvar instagramContainer = document.getElementById('gallery--1308488258'),\n\t\tw = gc.width,\n\t\tcount = w > 1506 ? 10 : ( w > 1206 ? 8 : ( w > 906 ? 9 : ( w > 606 ? 6 : 3 ))),\n\n\t\t// Begin loading dependencies immediately\n\t\t// Both are super lightweight, but Instagram API can take a while to respond\n\t\tinstagramDeps = Promise.all([\n\t\t\tgc.loadCachedJSON('instagram', '/wp-content/shared-gc/includes/rest-api/instagram/?count='+ count),\n\t\t\tgc.load('waterfall', '~/js/dist/responsive-waterfall.min.js')\n\t\t]),\n\n\t\t// Since photos take a while to load and position, load them a bit early as well\n\t\toffset = window.innerHeight * 2;\n\n\n\t// Don't load photos until near viewport\n\tgc.whenNearViewport(instagramContainer, initInstagram, offset);\n\n\tfunction initInstagram()\n\t{\n\t\tinstagramDeps.then(function(loaded)\n\t\t{\n\t\t\tvar instagramPosts = loaded[0],\n\t\t\t\thtml,\n\t\t\t\twaterfall;\n\n\t\t\t// Generate HTML for each item\n\t\t\thtml = instagramPosts.map(function (post)\n\t\t\t{\n\t\t\t\treturn '<figure class=\"gallery__item\"><a><img class=\"gallery__image\" src=\"'+ post.src_standard.url +'\" srcset=\"'+ post.src_low.url +' '+ post.src_low.width +'w, '+ post.src_standard.url +' '+ post.src_standard.width +'w\" width=400 height=400></a><figcaption><p>'+ post.text +'</p><p><a href=\"'+ post.link +'\" class=\"button button--dark\" target=\"_blank\">Open in Instagram</a></p></figcaption></figure>';\n\n\t\t\t}).join('');\n\n\t\t\t// Inject HTML\n\t\t\tinstagramContainer.innerHTML = html;\n\n\t\t\t// Setup waterfall\n\t\t\twaterfall = new Waterfall({\n\t\t\t\tcontainerSelector: '#gallery--1308488258',\n\t\t\t\tboxSelector: '#gallery--1308488258 .gallery__item',\n\t\t\t\tminBoxWidth: 300\n\t\t\t});\n\n\t\t\t// Display images when it's been setup. Try to prevent any jank\n\t\t\trequestAnimationFrame(function ()\n\t\t\t{\n\t\t\t\tinstagramContainer.classList.remove('gallery--loading');\n\t\t\t\tif ( gc.forceLoadPhotoswipe ) gc.forceLoadPhotoswipe();\n\t\t\t});\n\n\t\t})\n\t\t.catch(function(err)\n\t\t{\n\t\t\tconsole.log('Unable to fetch instagram API or waterfall library', err);\n\t\t});\n\t}\n}();\n</script>\n\n<p style=\"text-align: center; clear: both; margin-top: 2em;\"><a class=\"button button--dark button--strong\" href=\"/photos/\">Photo albums</a> <a class=\"button button--dark\" href=\"https://www.instagram.com/goshencollege/\">@GoshenCollege on Instagram</a></p>\n\n\n\t</section>\n\t\t\n<svg class=\"lp-separator lp-separator--triangle-shadow\" width=\"100%\" viewBox=\"0 0 100 100\" preserveAspectRatio=\"none\" style=\"background-color: #fff\">\n\t<path d=\"M0 -1 L50 100 L100 -1 Z\" fill=\"#212121\"></path>\n\t<path d=\"M50 100 L100 40 L100 0 Z\" fill=\"#eee\"></path>\n</svg>\n\n\t\t\t<section id=\"explore-campus-virtually-or-in-person\" class=\"lp-section lp-section--standard lp-section--white\">\n\n\t\t\t<h2 class=\"h1 lp-section__title\">Explore Campus, Virtually or In&nbsp;Person</h2>\n\t\n\t\t\t<div class=\"entry entry--padded entry--centered-column photoswipe-gallery\" style=\"padding-top: 0; padding-bottom: 0\">\n\t<figure id=\"attachment_5666\" style=\"width: 400px;\" class=\"wp-caption alignright wp-caption--small size-medium\"><a style=\"max-width: 400px\" href=\"/map/\"><img class=\"wp-image-5666 size-medium\" src=\"https://www.goshen.edu/wp-content/uploads/2017/04/map-400x253.png\" alt=\"Goshen College campus map\" width=\"400\" height=\"253\"></a><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Take a <a href=\"https://www.goshen.edu/map/?id=608#!t/963:1\">virtual tour of campus!</a></figcaption></figure>\n<p>Start to see yourself here! Visiting is one of the best ways to get a feel for campus — from classes and dorms to the dining hall menu — and decide if it’s a good fit for you.</p>\n<p><a class=\"button button--strong\" href=\"/admissions/visit/\">Schedule your&nbsp;campus visit</a></p>\n<p>Or take a virtual tour of campus — 135 acres filled with trees, squirrels and bikes!</p>\n<p><a class=\"button\" href=\"https://www.goshen.edu/map/?id=608#!t/963:1\">Start your&nbsp;virtual tour</a></p>\n<p>&nbsp;</p>\n\n</div>\n\t</section>\n\n\t\t\n\n\t    \n\t\t\t\t<footer class=\"footer\" id=\"\">window.attachEvent?window.attachEvent(\"onload\",wsa_include_js):window.addEventListener?window.addEventListener(\"load\",wsa_include_js,!1):document.addEventListener(\"load\",wsa_include_js,!1);\nfunction wsa_include_js(){gc.load(\"livechat\",\"https://tracking-v3.websitealive.com/3.0/?objectref\\x3dc1\\x26groupid\\x3d8644\\x26websiteid\\x3d0\").then(function(){function
